summary: This bill, the Felony Murder for Deadly Fentanyl Distribution Act of 2025, aims to punish the distribution of fentanyl that results in death as felony murder. It amends U.S. Code section 1111 to include fentanyl distribution after child abuse, defines 'distributing fentanyl,' specifying amounts and substances, and clarifies penalties, including the option of the death penalty or life imprisonment for first-degree murder involving fentanyl distribution.
